# Test runs


```{r test_initial_runs}

# Read species list
exploited_species_list <- read.csv("/Volumes/Enterprise/Data/SAU/exploited_species_list.csv")

# Read runs
runs <- list.files("/Volumes/Enterprise/Data/FIshMip/protocol_3b_runs/C6GFDL85PIF1MPA0",full.names = T)

# DBEM coordinates

coods_dbem <- MyFunctions::my_path("Spa",extra_path = "DBEM", name = "Lon_Lat_DBEM.txt",system = "juliano", read = T)

for(i in 1:length(runs)){
  i = 1
  
  # Select data and variables 
  data_to_load <- runs[i]
  str_length(data_to_load)
  taxon_key <- str_sub(data_to_load,68,73)
  taxon_name <- exploited_species_list %>% 
    filter(TaxonKey == taxon_key) %>% 
    pull(CommonName)
  var <- str_sub(data_to_load,74,76)
  file_name <- paste0(taxon_key,"_",var)
  
  load(data_to_load)
  
  colnames(data) <- seq(1850,1950,1)
  
  # First make a time series of the data
  
  
  linear_data <-
    data %>% 
    as.data.frame() %>%
    bind_cols(grid_mpa) %>% 
    # names()
    pivot_longer(
      cols = starts_with("1"),
      names_to = "year",
      values_to = "value") %>% 
    mutate(year = as.numeric(year)) %>% 
    filter(!is.na(value)) %>% 
    group_by(year,status) %>% 
    summarise(mean = mean(value,na.rm = T),
              max = max(value,na.rm = T),
              min = min(value,na.rm = T)
    ) %>% 
    pivot_longer(
      cols = starts_with("m"),
      names_to = "variable",
      values_to = "value")
  
  
  p <-linear_data %>% 
    ggplot + 
    geom_line(
      aes(
        x = year,
        y = value,
        color = status
      )
    ) +
    facet_wrap(~variable,
               scales = "free",
               ncol = 1) +
    ggtitle(paste(taxon_key,taxon_name,var))
  
    ggsave(paste0("../Results/Test/tl_",taxon_key,"_",taxon_name,"_",var,".png"),
           p)
  
  
  #### now Map
    
  m <- data %>% 
    as.data.frame() %>%
    select(`1855`,`1900`,`1949`) %>% 
    bind_cols(grid_mpa) %>% 
    pivot_longer(
      cols = starts_with("1"),
      names_to = "year",
      values_to = "value") %>% 
    mutate(year = as.numeric(year)) %>% 
    filter(!is.na(value)) %>% 
    left_join(coods_dbem) %>% 
    ggplot() +
    geom_tile(
      aes(
        x = lon,
        y = lat,
        fill = value,
        color = value,
      )
    ) +
    # geom_sf(data = rnaturalearth::ne_countries(scale = 'large', returnclass = c("sf")),aes()) +
    facet_wrap(~year, ncol = 1) +
    scale_fill_viridis_b() +
    scale_color_viridis_b() +
    coord_map()
    
  ggsave(paste0("../Results/Test/gm_",taxon_key,"_",taxon_name,"_",var,".png"),
         m)
  
}
